amendatorysection.catchline: School of cosmetology license; school of esthetics license; application.
amendatorysection.para: Any person seeking a license to operate a school of cosmetology or school of esthetics shall submit a completed application at least thirty days before construction or remodeling of the building proposed for use is scheduled to begin. If no construction or remodeling is planned, the application shall be received at least thirty days before the proposed opening of the school.
